scripts.preinstall: echo --- preinstall --- && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: echo --- start --- && cd backend && npm start
scripts.i: echo --install packages-- && cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i
scripts.push: echo --pushing to GitHub-- && git add . && git commit -m 'updated files' && git push
